actions.text: Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for a committee to notify the President that the House has completed legislative business.

summary.text: Provides that a committee of two Members be appointed by the House of Representatives to join a similar committee of the Senate to notify the President that the Congress has completed its business of the session.

titles.title: A resolution providing for a committee to notify the President that the House has completed legislative business.
